com.viaoa.util
Class OAJsonWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.util.OAJsonWriter

public class OAJsonWriter
extends java.lang.Object

OAJsonWriter creates an JSON file that can then be read using an OAJsonReader.
If an object has already been stored in the file, then its key will be stored.

See Also:
OAJsonReader

shouldIncludeProperty

public boolean shouldIncludeProperty(java.lang.Object obj,
                                     java.lang.String propertyName,
                                     java.lang.Object value,
                                     OALinkInfo li)
called by OAObject.write to know if object should be written for a property that references another OAObject. This can be overwritten to control which properties are saved. default is true;

convertToString

public java.lang.String convertToString(java.lang.String property,
                                        java.lang.Object value)
Method that can be overwritten to provide custom conversion to String. Called to convert a value to a String when there does not exist an OAConverter for a class.

Returns:
null to skip property.
